member.name: T:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.HttpRequestRewindExtensions
member.summary: Extension methods for enabling buffering in an .

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.HttpRequestRewindExtensions.EnableBuffering(Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.HttpRequest)
member.summary: Ensure the can be read multiple times. Normally buffers request bodies in memory; writes requests larger than 30K bytes to disk.
member.remarks: Temporary files for larger requests are written to the location named in the ASPNETCORE_TEMP environment variable, if any. If that environment variable is not defined, these files are written to the current user's temporary folder. Files are automatically deleted at the end of their associated requests.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.HttpRequestRewindExtensions.EnableBuffering(Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.HttpRequest,System.Int32)
member.summary: Ensure the can be read multiple times. Normally buffers request bodies in memory; writes requests larger than bytes to disk.
member.param: The maximum size in bytes of the in-memory used to buffer the stream. Larger request bodies are written to disk.
member.remarks: Temporary files for larger requests are written to the location named in the ASPNETCORE_TEMP environment variable, if any. If that environment variable is not defined, these files are written to the current user's temporary folder. Files are automatically deleted at the end of their associated requests.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.HttpRequestRewindExtensions.EnableBuffering(Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.HttpRequest,System.Int64)
member.summary: Ensure the can be read multiple times. Normally buffers request bodies in memory; writes requests larger than 30K bytes to disk.
member.param: The maximum size in bytes of the request body. An attempt to read beyond this limit will cause an .
member.remarks: Temporary files for larger requests are written to the location named in the ASPNETCORE_TEMP environment variable, if any. If that environment variable is not defined, these files are written to the current user's temporary folder. Files are automatically deleted at the end of their associated requests.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.HttpRequestRewindExtensions.EnableBuffering(Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.HttpRequest,System.Int32,System.Int64)
member.summary: Ensure the can be read multiple times. Normally buffers request bodies in memory; writes requests larger than bytes to disk.
member.param: The maximum size in bytes of the in-memory used to buffer the stream. Larger request bodies are written to disk.
The maximum size in bytes of the request body. An attempt to read beyond this limit will cause an .
member.remarks: Temporary files for larger requests are written to the location named in the ASPNETCORE_TEMP environment variable, if any. If that environment variable is not defined, these files are written to the current user's temporary folder. Files are automatically deleted at the end of their associated requests.

member.name: T:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.Features.FormOptions
member.summary: Options to configure reading the request body as a HTTP form.

member.name: F:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.Features.FormOptions.DefaultMemoryBufferThreshold
member.summary: Default value for . Defaults to 65,536 bytes‬, which is approximately 64KB.

member.name: F:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.Features.FormOptions.DefaultBufferBodyLengthLimit
member.summary: Default value for . Defaults to 134,217,728 bytes‬, which is 128MB.

member.name: F:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.Features.FormOptions.DefaultMultipartBoundaryLengthLimit
member.summary: Default value for . Defaults to 128 bytes‬.

member.name: F:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.Features.FormOptions.DefaultMultipartBodyLengthLimit
member.summary: Default value for . Defaults to 134,217,728 bytes‬, which is approximately 128MB.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.Features.FormOptions.BufferBody
member.summary: Enables full request body buffering. Use this if multiple components need to read the raw stream. Defaults to false.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.Features.FormOptions.MemoryBufferThreshold
member.summary: If is enabled, this many bytes of the body will be buffered in memory. If this threshold is exceeded then the buffer will be moved to a temp file on disk instead. This also applies when buffering individual multipart section bodies. Defaults to 65,536 bytes‬, which is approximately 64KB.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.Features.FormOptions.BufferBodyLengthLimit
member.summary: If is enabled, this is the limit for the total number of bytes that will be buffered. Forms that exceed this limit will throw an when parsed. Defaults to 134,217,728 bytes‬, which is approximately 128MB.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.Features.FormOptions.ValueCountLimit
member.summary: A limit for the number of form entries to allow. Forms that exceed this limit will throw an when parsed. Defaults to 1024.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.Features.FormOptions.KeyLengthLimit
member.summary: A limit on the length of individual keys. Forms containing keys that exceed this limit will throw an when parsed. Defaults to 2,048 bytes‬, which is approximately 2KB.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.Features.FormOptions.ValueLengthLimit
member.summary: A limit on the length of individual form values. Forms containing values that exceed this limit will throw an when parsed. Defaults to 4,194,304 bytes‬, which is approximately 4MB.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.Features.FormOptions.MultipartBoundaryLengthLimit
member.summary: A limit for the length of the boundary identifier. Forms with boundaries that exceed this limit will throw an when parsed. Defaults to 128 bytes‬.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.Features.FormOptions.MultipartHeadersCountLimit
member.summary: A limit for the number of headers to allow in each multipart section. Headers with the same name will be combined. Form sections that exceed this limit will throw an when parsed. Defaults to 16.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.Features.FormOptions.MultipartHeadersLengthLimit
member.summary: A limit for the total length of the header keys and values in each multipart section. Form sections that exceed this limit will throw an when parsed. Defaults to 16,384‬ bytes‬, which is approximately 16KB.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.Features.FormOptions.MultipartBodyLengthLimit
member.summary: A limit for the length of each multipart body. Forms sections that exceed this limit will throw an when parsed. Defaults to 134,217,728 bytes‬, which is approximately 128MB.

member.name: T:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.SendFileFallback
member.summary:
Helper type that allows copying a file to a Stream.
This type is part of ASP.NET Core's infrastructure and should not used by application code.

member.summary: Copies the segment of the file to the destination stream.
member.param: The stream to write the file segment to.
The full disk path to the file.
The offset in the file to start at.
The number of bytes to send, or null to send the remainder of the file.
A used to abort the transmission.

member.param: The full disk path to the file.
The offset in the file to start at.
The number of bytes to send, or null to send the remainder of the file.
A used to abort the transmission.

member.summary: Flushes the given stream if this has not previously been called.

member.summary: This calls StartAsync if it has not previously been called. It will complete the adapted pipe if it exists.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.StreamResponseBodyFeature.Dispose
member.summary: Prevents CompleteAsync from operating.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.StreamCopyOperationInternal.CopyToAsync(System.IO.Stream,System.IO.Stream,System.Nullable{System.Int64},System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Asynchronously reads the given number of bytes from the source stream and writes them to another stream.
member.returns: A task that represents the asynchronous copy operation.
member.param: The stream from which the contents will be copied.
The stream to which the contents of the current stream will be copied.
The count of bytes to be copied.
The token to monitor for cancellation requests. The default value is .

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.StreamCopyOperationInternal.CopyToAsync(System.IO.Stream,System.IO.Stream,System.Nullable{System.Int64},System.Int32,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Asynchronously reads the given number of bytes from the source stream and writes them to another stream, using a specified buffer size.
member.returns: A task that represents the asynchronous copy operation.
member.param: The stream from which the contents will be copied.
The stream to which the contents of the current stream will be copied.
The count of bytes to be copied.
The size, in bytes, of the buffer. This value must be greater than zero. The default size is 4096.
The token to monitor for cancellation requests. The default value is .
